item.description:
Normally I plan a a meeting spot for the Newcomers for St. Patty's everyday... this year, I failed! Luckily, Providence Area Singles already has posted to meet at Fat Belly's, and already have a large number of rsvps. Since many of the members are in both groups, why not do a joint St. Patty's meetup?

 

See you Thursday and don't forget to wear green!

 

**Note: You do not have to be single to attend. =)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wait in the front starting 7:45pm or message me to get my cell if you plan on arriving after 8pm
item.name: St. Patty's @ Fat Belly's
